City of Crane Departments
=========================

Here to Serve
-------------

…the citizens and visitors of Crane Texas. Review the department information below. Each department strives to provide all the tools you need to keep you informed.



#### City Government

The office of the Mayor and City Council.



#### Police Department

Providing our community security, well-being and crime reduction.



#### Fire Department

Fire fighting & prevention with paramedic services.



#### City Administration

City Hall, Administrator and Secretary



#### Municipal Court

Providing legal process support for our community.



#### Public Works

Keeping our community running smoothly.



#### Emergency Management

Helping the community anticipate hazards and undertake measures to effectively deal with disasters
